ClaimPayoutPlan.name: ClaimPayoutPlan
ClaimPayoutPlan.description: Represents the payout plan details for a claim, such as payment frequency, duration, and payouts.

ClaimId.description: The claim associated with the claim payout plan.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

EndDate.description: The date the claim payout plan ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: Name of the claim payout plan.

PaymentFrequency.description: Specifies the frequency of the payment if the coverage entails a recurring payout to the insured.

PlannedPaymentAmount.description: The amount paid to the party at each payout.

PreviousClaimPayoutPlanId.description: The previous payout plan associated with the claim payout plan.

StartDate.description: The date the claim payout plan starts.
